label: esp-idf set-target
command: export IDF_TOOLCHAIN=clang && source $HOME/esp/esp-idf/export.sh && idf.py set-target esp32c3

label: esp-idf flash & monitor
command: export IDF_TOOLCHAIN=clang && source $HOME/esp/esp-idf/export.sh && idf.py -p /dev/ttyUSB0 flash && idf.py -p /dev/ttyUSB0 monitor

label: esp-idf build & flash & monitor
command: export IDF_TOOLCHAIN=clang && source $HOME/esp/esp-idf/export.sh && idf.py build && idf.py -p /dev/ttyUSB0 flash && idf.py -p /dev/ttyUSB0 monitor
